events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case was assigned to agent Emily R. to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello, I understand you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, we need a photo of the item you received and your order confirmation details. Could you please share these?
Here is the photo of the wrong item I got, along with my order number 123456. Please let me know the next steps for the refund.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the prompt refund and look forward to the confirmation email.
The refund request has been completed successfully, and the customer has been notified that the funds will appear in their account soon.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Thanks again for the excellent support throughout this process.
The support case has been closed following the successful refund and positive customer feedback.
